item.title: Data Exploration and Visualization on Bean Market Data
item.description: Data Exploration I wanted to take a break this week from Machine Learning and prediction algorithms on the bean data and do a bit of data exploration and visualization of what is a pretty rich data set. The idea here is a bit of a conceptual switch from what we’ve been exploring - here, I’m interested in picking apart trends in the market, and examining relationships between the variables. First, let’s import the data from github and get the appropriate packages loaded:
